context: Pure Storage has 0.67% market share in storage infrastructure with 52 competitors. Over 2,591 companies worldwide use Pure Storage, with 1,473 (69.45%) in the United States. Top industries: Managed Services (131), Cloud Services (106), and Cybersecurity (97). Key differentiators include all-flash architecture, non-disruptive upgrades, and subscription-based model. Established leader in all-flash storage arrays for enterprise environments.
